selections.name: Dujardin
selections.reason: Te Akau runner with Opie Bosson aboard. Placed 3rd fresh and looks primed to break maiden status here.

selections.name: Wee Nessy
selections.reason: Consistent performer with a solid 2nd last start. Draws well and maps to get a good run.

selections.name: Cheerful Smile
selections.reason: Caught the eye closing well for 4th last start. Wide draw is the concern but has ability.

selections.name: Integrity
selections.reason: Improved effort to run 3rd last time out. Drawn to get a soft run on the rail.

danger_horse.name: Wee Nessy
danger_horse.reason: Very consistent and won't be far away at the finish.

selections.name: Vistown
selections.reason: Coming off a strong 2nd placing. Draws the ace and stays in a similar grade.

selections.name: Intoxicated
selections.reason: Marsh stable runner who has been competitive in this grade. 3rd two starts back reads well.

selections.name: Tarzador
selections.reason: Not far away recently, finishing 4th and 2nd in last two starts. Each-way hope.

selections.name: Rosina
selections.reason: Winner three starts back. Can mix form but has ability at this level.

danger_horse.name: Intoxicated
danger_horse.reason: Consistent type who should be in the finish.

selections.name: Navy Ensign
selections.reason: Very consistent maiden with three consecutive 2nd placings. Deserves a win and finds a winnable race.

selections.name: Force Of Law
selections.reason: Resuming with Opie Bosson booked. Trial form is okay, watch for market moves.

selections.name: Sister Cynane
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start. Draws well and should be competitive.

selections.name: Nasha Mala
selections.reason: Fair effort for 4th last start. Place chance in this field.

selections.name: Night Wolf
selections.reason: Consistent form line (3rd, 5th, 2nd, 2nd). Hard to knock and should go close.

selections.name: Show Your Ace
selections.reason: Improved performance to run 3rd last start. Building fitness.

selections.name: Loose Change
selections.reason: Experienced campaigner who ran 4th last time. Place chance.

selections.name: Shoebill
selections.reason: Forsman/Grylls combination. Needs luck from the wide draw but has upside.

selections.name: Kind Of Blue
selections.reason: Strong 2nd placing last start. Looks the one to beat on that form.

selections.name: Saltburn
selections.reason: Finished 6th on debut but should take improvement from the run.

selections.name: Scutalong
selections.reason: Mid-field finish last time. Can improve into the placings here.

selections.name: Tall Timber
selections.reason: Has shown glimpses of ability. Place chance from a good draw.

danger_horse.name: Saltburn
danger_horse.reason: Likely improver from a good stable.

selections.name: Incredible Patch
selections.reason: Excellent debut run finishing 2nd. The one to beat with natural improvement.

selections.name: Wind Seeker
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start. Consistent type who will be competitive.

selections.name: The Mailman
selections.reason: Ran 5th last start. Marsh stable, expect a bold showing.

selections.name: Jeeves
selections.reason: Has been around the mark. Place claims.

selections.name: Artamos
selections.reason: Good 3rd last start. Looks ready to break through in this field.

selections.name: Camacho
selections.reason: Consistent 3rd last time out. Drawn the rail to get every chance.

selections.name: Kudos
selections.reason: Finished 5th last start. Should be running on at the finish.

selections.name: Rob's Mistake
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Must be respected on that effort.

selections.name: Cease And Desist
selections.reason: Last start winner who looks destined for higher grades. Opie Bosson rides for Te Akau.

selections.name: Ever Charm
selections.reason: Consistent type (5th last start). Drawn well and should be in the mix.

selections.name: Lerado
selections.reason: Experienced galloper. Ignore last run, previous form was solid.

selections.name: Liquid Fire
selections.reason: Has ability but the wide draw makes it tough. Place chance if luck goes his way.
